text: gyeolhonhal neunglyeog-eul gaj-ji moshan ja ege hananimkkeseo geubun-ui eunhyelo neunglyeog-eul jul ttaekkaji jajehalago ha la geuligo neohuiga soyuhago issneun haindeul jung-eseo iljeong-geum-aeg-eulo haebang jeungseoleul wonhal gyeong-u neohuiga geudeul ga undeseo sin-im-eul balgyeonhandamyeon geudeul-e ge jungseoleul jula geuligo hananimkke seo neohuiege bepun jaesanjung-eseo geu deul-ege il-yonghal yangsig-eul jula geuleo na hyeonse-ui iig-eul eod-eulyeo hanyeodeul ege gan-eumhaeng-wileul gang-yohaji malla geudeul-eun sungyeol-eul jikigoja hanila man-il geunyeodeul-ege gang-yohaneun jaga iss-eo gang-yodoeeoss-eul ttae hananim-eun geu nyeoege gwan-yong-gwa jabileul bepusinila
